name: MegaBEER
description:
'Come in and close the door, it's hot out there, we're in Seville!'

MegaBEER is a free 2D arcade-puzzle game. Your goal is solving math and quiz meanwhile the jar of beer must be filled with simple game mechanics. It was fully coded and designed in 48 hours at Familiar Game Jam #6.

Tweet out Jam activity with the hashtag #MegaBEER and follow us Fancy Ork, we'll really appreciate it.

Instructions:

Move only the jar with clean beer and avoid the nasty one!
Move left: 'Left arrow'
Move right: 'Right arrow'
Solve the puzzles...if you can!
